text: Hurricane Ione was a strong, Category 4 hurricane that affected North Carolina in September 1955, bringing high winds and significant rainfall. It came on the heels of Hurricanes Connie and Diane, and compounded problems already caused by the two earlier hurricanes. Category:Category 4 Atlantic hurricanes Category:Retired tropical cyclone names Category:Hurricanes in North Carolina Category:1950s in North Carolina Category:1955 in the United States Category:September events Category:1950s in weather
title: Hurricane Ione
